name: CADE PRIME
description:
CADE PRIME is the DoD's most advanced android. Bad Dudes have placed him inside of the Mainframe. Can You help him solve challenging puzzles in order to escape ?

Featuring Puzzles, Parkour and Platforming Action.

Each Level gets more challenging.

Interact with the objects in each area to test Your logic skills.

*** Challenge ***

"Steamy Streamer" Challenge - Get ALL of the Archor Games products available on Steam and Stream ALL of them Beginning to End.
